A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Pros:
Visually stunning\, a few good fight scenes.

Cons: Jokes are forced\, bad dialogue\, plot holes everywhere\, jarring editing\, unsatisfying character development\, entire plot is just a slow chase scene

Overall with the plot\, character development\, dialogue leaving such a bad taste in your mouth it's hard to appreciate any merits of the movies which are few.
